department.ch: 網路學習科技研究所碩士班
department.en: Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology

goal.ch: This course is tailored for graduate students and serves as an extensive introduction to the research methods employed in the field of e-learning. Throughout the course, we will delve into the fundamental concepts of educational research and its application within the realm of e-learning. We will thoroughly examine the various essential research methods commonly utilized in e-learning research, encompassing qualitative, quantitative, as well as mixed research methodologies. Furthermore, students enrolled in this course will gain comprehensive insights into the step-by-step process of educational research in e-learning, ranging from formulating research problems to conducting literature reviews, developing research questions and hypotheses, structuring research designs, carrying out data collection and analyses, and finally, drawing conclusive findings and inferences. Students will also be expected to complete a research proposal by the culmination of the semester.
goal.en: This course is tailored for graduate students and serves as an extensive introduction to the research methods employed in the field of e-learning. Throughout the course, we will delve into the fundamental concepts of educational research and its application within the realm of e-learning. We will thoroughly examine the various essential research methods commonly utilized in e-learning research, encompassing qualitative, quantitative, as well as mixed research methodologies. Furthermore, students enrolled in this course will gain comprehensive insights into the step-by-step process of educational research in e-learning, ranging from formulating research problems to conducting literature reviews, developing research questions and hypotheses, structuring research designs, carrying out data collection and analyses, and finally, drawing conclusive findings and inferences. Students will also be expected to complete a research proposal by the culmination of the semester.

outline.ch:
授課內容：
Week 1：課程介紹
Week 2：教育研究與數位學習研究的基本概念
Week 3：數位學習研究的模式與類別
Week 4：研究主題與其概念化
Week 5：理論與文獻探討
Week 6：研究問題的操作化
Week 7：研究群體與樣本選取
Week 8：描述性研究：調查研究法、發展研究法、相關研究法
Week 9：期中考週
Week 10：因果性研究：實驗研究法（一）
Week 11：因果性研究：實驗研究法（二）
Week 12：詮釋性研究：質性研究（一）
Week 13：詮釋性研究：質性研究（二）
Week 14：混合研究方法
Week 15：研究工具的發展與使用
Week 16：期刊論文基本評析與報告
Week 17：期末報告
Week 18：期末報告
outline.en:
Course Contents:
Week 1: Course Introduction
Week 2: Fundamental Concepts of Digital Learning Research
Week 3: Patterns and Categories of Digital Learning Research
Week 4: Research themes and conceptualization
Week 5: Theory and Literature Discussion
Week 6: Operationalisation of Research Questions
Week 7: Research population and sample selection
Week 8: Descriptive Research: Survey Research, Development Research, Correlation Research
Week 9: Midterm exam week
Week 10: Causal Research: Experimental Research Method (1)
Week 11: Causal Research: Experimental Research Method (2)
Week 12: Interpretive Research: Qualitative Research (1)
Week 13: Interpretive Research: Qualitative Research (2)
Week 14: Mixed Research Methods
Week 15: Development and use of research tools
Week 16: Analysis and Report of Journal Papers
Week 17: Final Report
Week 18: Final Report

textbook.ch:
1.林生傳（2003）。教育研究法：全方位的統整與分析。台北：心理。
2. Ary, D., Jacobs, L. C., ＆ Sorensen, C. (2010). Introduction to research in education (8th ed.). Belmont, CA: Wadsworth, Cengage Learning.
3.王文科、王智弘（2009）。教育研究法（第13 版）。台北：五南圖書出版公司。
4.潘中道、胡龍騰譯（2010）。研究方法：步驟化學習指南（第2版）。台北：學富。
5.謝志偉、王慧玉譯（2010）。混合方法研究導論。台北：心理。
textbook.en:
1.林生傳（2003）。教育研究法：全方位的統整與分析。台北：心理。
2. Ary, D., Jacobs, L. C., ＆ Sorensen, C. (2010). Introduction to research in education (8th ed.). Belmont, CA: Wadsworth, Cengage Learning.
3.王文科、王智弘（2009）。教育研究法（第13 版）。台北：五南圖書出版公司。
4.潘中道、胡龍騰譯（2010）。研究方法：步驟化學習指南（第2版）。台北：學富。
5.謝志偉、王慧玉譯（2010）。混合方法研究導論。台北：心理。

instructMethod.ch:
講授
研討

個別指導

gradMethod.ch:
Class participation (10％)
Homework (40％)
Midterm Report (20％)
Proposal report (30％)
gradMethod.en:
Class participation (10％)
Homework (40％)
Midterm Report (20％)
Proposal report (30％)

flexDiscription.ch: The flipped learning method with the project will be conducted online in 1-2 weeks. By utilizing online educational resources, along with post-class reflections and hands-on activities, students are encouraged to engage in self-directed learning and explore interdisciplinary knowledge.
flexDiscription.en: The flipped learning method with the project will be conducted online in 1-2 weeks. By utilizing online educational resources, along with post-class reflections and hands-on activities, students are encouraged to engage in self-directed learning and explore interdisciplinary knowledge.

ch.competencies: 認識數位學習之發展歷史與趨勢
培養數位學習之理論素養
培養數位學習所需之科技能力
培養數位學習研究方法與推廣應用之能力
培養創新設計與協調整合之能力
培養具國際觀之跨領域人才

en.competencies: Understand the developing history and trend of network learning.
Develop the theoretical accomplishment of network learning.
Develop the needed technological ability of network learning.
Develop the research methodology of network learning and the ability to  promote and put network learning in use.
Develop the ability to coordinate and make innovative design.
Develop multi-disciplined  talents with international perspective.

ch: 學制:限碩士班、博士班。學院:限資電學院。
系所:限網路學習科技研究所碩士班、資訊工程學系AI碩士班、網路學習科技研究所博士班。
en: Type:Master's Program、Doctoral Program only.Faculty:College of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science only.

Department:Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology、Master‘s Program in Artificial Intelligence, Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering、PhD in  Institute of Network Learning Technology only.
